protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the cross-linking of proteins and the conjugation of polyamines to proteins.

go_class.description: branching involved in salivary gland morphogenesis
elevation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration involved in phospholipase C-activating G-protein coupled signaling pathway
positive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB cascade
positive regulation of smooth muscle cell proliferation
